caption.center: STATE OF OREGON, Appellant, v. RICKY DONNELL SHARP, Respondent.

date.center: Affirmed by an equally divided court October 26, 1994

opinion.posture:
Appeal from Circuit Court, Douglas County.
Robert C. Millikan, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jonathan H. Fussner, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief were Theodore R. Kulongoski, Attorney General, and Virginia L. Linder, Solicitor General.
Andrew D. Johnson argued the cause for respondent. On the brief was Darryl E. Johnson, P.C.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed by an equally divided court.Page 149
